entry.summary: Flashbots 推出 MEV-Share 协议的测试版，以将 MEV 利润分配给以太坊用户。该协议被纳入 Flashbots Protect 中，这是一个与用户钱包集成的 RPC 工具，旨在防御前置交易。MEV-Share 通过让用户控制他们在以太坊网络上执行的交易来实现这一点。（The Block）https://www.theblock.co/post/227310/flashbots-mev-share-ethereum-users

entry.title: Great piece by Hal. I agree - $eth is the better SoV. This isn’t widely understood by the market, creating an opportunity for long-term holders. I to...
entry.summary:
Great piece by Hal. I agree - $eth is the better SoV. This isn’t widely understood by the market, creating an opportunity for long-term holders. I touched on many of these topics in a substack last year: Ethereum is the Better Bet. https://defisurfer808.substack.com/p/ethereum-is-the-better-bet
Hal Press: I have spoken at length on podcasts about why I think ETH is a superior SoV to BTC but this is the most in depth writing I've done on the topic. Most of this is taken from prior pieces but given that Shanghai is now behind us and ETH's transition to PoS is complete I thought it… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1648685797766475776

entry.title: Re @CryptoDonAlt "Prices, like everything else, move along the line of least resistance. The trend has been established before the news is published, ...
entry.summary: Re @CryptoDonAlt "Prices, like everything else, move along the line of least resistance. The trend has been established before the news is published, and in bull markets bear items are ignored and bull news exaggerated, and vice versa." - Reminiscences of a Stock Operator
